result.arabic_text: يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِنَّ أَرۡضِي وَٰسِعَةٞ فَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
result.translation: 56. Кее Yi-naqoosay, yeemeneh yan maraw! iimaan taybulleenimik ceyat teneenik diggah Yi-baaxó farakka-le, toysa Yi-baaxóy farakka ittah fan guurumaay, qibaadâ dubuk yoh caglisa keenik iyya Valii.
